resources.string: Now you can click on the tray icon to enable power saving. Your screen will turn off while your phone is facing a surface, like flipped on a table or inside your pocket. Whenever you see your screen it will be back on. Cheers!
To save battery, the screen will turn off while your phone is facing a surface, like flipped on a table or inside your pocket. When you see your screen again it will turn back on. Cheers!
We can\'t do it without your permission
